vlibtour.vlibtour_emulation_visit

Class GraphOfPositionsForEmulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • vlibtour.vlibtour_emulation_visit.GraphOfPositionsForEmulation

  • public final class GraphOfPositionsForEmulation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the methods to manipulate a graph of positions for emulating a visit in a scenario. It provides many utility methods. You are free to complement or modify this code.

    This is only for writing scenarios with the emulation of locations.

    The data structures are designed to allow the management of the mobility of several users.

    You are free to use this class internally (in your clients for instance) or through a remote call (in a REST server for instance).

    Be careful to not use this class to simplify the distributed implementation of the management of the visits!

    A limitation of the current implementation is that there is only one graph of positions.

    The first part of the class is the definition of the graph with its methods: e.g. addEdge(Map, Position, Position) or computePathsFromDepartureToDestination(Map, Object, Object).

    The second part of the class is the definition of paths with its methods: stepInCurrentPath(String), etc.

    Please consult the class VisitEmulationServer that uses the data structures and the methods of this class.

    Author:
    Denis Conan

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
